Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (South Ionian?) pottery cup; very worn, especially outside; interior glazed, fired light orange, with an added red band; outside worn; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 319)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 670, no. 280)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.878)
